LanguageData.AteTiberiumMeatDirect.stages.0.label: 오염된 식재료 섭취
LanguageData.AteTiberiumMeatDirect.stages.0.descripti: 녹색빛이 감도는 고깃덩이를 먹었다. 죽을 정도로 끔찍한 맛이었어.
LanguageData.AteTiberiumMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.des: 녹색빛이 감도는 요리를 먹다가 작은 결정 조각에 혀를 찔렸어. 상처가 타들어가는 느낌이야.
LanguageData.AteMutatedMeatDirect.stages.0.label: ate mutated meat
LanguageData.AteMutatedMeatDirect.stages.0.descriptio: I ate some glowing, tough meat. this meat tastes terrible.
LanguageData.AteMutatedMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.desc: I ate a meal cooked from glowing meat. The seasoning partly covered the taste, but a terrible taste is covering my tongue yet.
